definition: to take advantage of sb/to freeload
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Mr. Brown is known as a free loader.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生是個人所共知的喜歡揩油的人。

sentences.english: That finding suggested that the original result was not influenced by any desire to prevent freeloaders.
sentences.chinese: 這表明原有結果並沒有因想阻止揩油的人受影響。

sentences.english: He's joining the club in order to take advantage of the others.
I have this neighbour that likes to grope girls when they are passing by on bus.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個鄰居，專喜歡在公共汽車上揩油。

definition: pervert (esp. one who gropes women in public)
to raise and lower one's hand (idiom); to signal as conspiratorial hint/fig. conspiring to defraud
to eat tofu/(fig.) to flirt/to tease
to take liberties with a woman/to dally/to assail a woman with obscenities
to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
carelessly and haphazardly/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
to play dirty tricks/to be up to mischief
advantageous/favorable/to benefit at others' expense/to take unfair advantage
to throw oneself in sb's arms/to throw oneself at sb
to force oneself upon sb (idiom)/to rape
